segments.text: What do you do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have many hobbies . I like almost all kinds of sports and I also like to listen to classical music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of sports do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like playing basketball . Basketball is a very exciting game because it keeps you alert and I also enjoy the team spirit of basketball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the novels of Dickens very much . I've read almost all of them in Chinese translation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I like listening to Beethoven's works .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of films do you enjoy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like all kinds as long as they are exciting .
segments.speaker: S2
